CREDMARK COMMUNITY UPDATE — JULY 2021

Neil Zumwalde I 07.06.2021

Hello Credmark Community!


From now on, we’re publishing a community update on the first Tuesday of every month. They detail the progress we’ve made, upcoming product enhancements, and team updates for the next month.


IDO

If you’re part of the Credmark community and don’t know we launched our CMK token this month I have to assume you were backpacking in the Alaskan wilderness without a satellite phone. If that’s you, welcome back! Here’s what happened.

From June 15th to June 18th we ran a public sale of our CMK utility/governance token. We did this by making CMK available on Uniswap so that anyone could swap CMK.

We were the first project to run an IDO on Uniswap v3 (full post-mortem here), which makes us either crazy or courageous. Or maybe both.

We designed the IDO with one primary goal: make CMK available to our community, to make sure that early users have a strong voice in our development and decentralization process. We publicized how we were planning on reaching this goal in this post. Unfortunately, some participants hadn’t read it and were surprised that we were more focused on protecting downside than mooning.

Was that good for the community?

Definitely. Not only were you, the community, able to afford enough tokens to have your voices heard, but the token price stayed steady throughout and immediately following the three day IDO, a time where many other projects lost huge amounts of value.

PLATFORM

In June we announced our first product: the Uniswap SmartPool. We love Uniswap — did you know we ran our IDO on Uniswap?! 😉 — but we understand how difficult it can be to setup or add liquidity. Our first product simplifies the process by relying on custom-built risk models to automatically add liquidity in line with the user’s risk tolerance.

The Uniswap SmartPool is a great example of the kinds of applications that can be built on the Credmark platform, using publicly available data to model and tailor a user’s experience specifically to their risk tolerance.


TEAM

In June our already rock-solid team was further fortified by the addition of our very own superstar CTO, Emilie Yeager. With 20 years of experience in devops, product management, and technical infrastructure, Emilie is easily the best candidate we could have hoped for for this position. Expect great things from her.

COMING UP

What can you expect from us this coming month?

  • The release of Uniswap SmartPool. ⚖️ → 💰
  • Our platform roadmap. 🧭
  • More product announcements. 📣

Stretch goal:

  • The announcement of another key team member. 💪🏻
